entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 70
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST IN THE AFTERNOON

CLEAR
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 70
CALM WINDS

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

CLEAR, HOT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
